title: Burton Spring/Summer Collection -- Destination Not Required
description:
The life we live during winter is more than just seasonal, it's who we are every day. Enjoying what the outdoors has to offer, taking a road trip with friends, or just sitting back and soaking it all in—these are the qualities that separate us from everyone else. That same spirit of adventure, fun, and enjoying life to the fullest lives on in the new Burton Spring/Summer collection. 

Shot on location in Puerto Rico with Mark Sollors, Werni Stock, Cilka Sadar, and a couple good people with photography by Tim Barber.

Artist: The Clean
Song: Beatnik
Album: Anthology

asset.author: Burton Snowboards
